mapper.select: select c.cnum , c.ctext , date_format(c.cdatetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as cdatetime , a.unick , case when minute(timediff(now(), c.cdatetime)) < 1 then concat(second(timediff(now(), c.cdatetime)), '초 전') when hour(timediff(now(), c.cdatetime)) < 1 then concat(minute(timediff(now(), c.cdatetime)), '분 전') when hour(timediff(now(), c.cdatetime)) < 24 then concat(hour(timediff(now(), c.cdatetime)), '시간 전') else concat(datediff(now(), c.cdatetime), '일 전') end as commentdesc from comment c , account a where c.user_num = a.unum and c.post_num = #{post_num} order by cnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment (ctext, cdatetime, post_num, user_num) values(#{ctext}, now(), #{post_num}, #{user_num})
mapper.select: select c.cnum , m.profile from comment c , myPage m where c.user_num = m.user_num and c.cnum = #{cnum}
